summary: A utility script that translates Kandinsky model checkpoints into the format expected by the HuggingFace Diffusers library. It parses original checkpoint files, restructures weights for components such as UNet, VQâ€‘Model, and Prior Transformer, and writes out compatible Diffusers checkpoints.
business_intent: Allow developers to leverage existing Kandinsky pretrained models within the Diffusers ecosystem, enabling image generation, inpainting, and related tasks without retraining, thus accelerating product development and research workflows.
